title: DuckDB Connection — duck_con
text: dbdir Location database files. path existing directory file system. default (""), data kept RAM. read_only Set TRUE read-operation. file-based databases, applied database file opened first time. Subsequent connections (via drv object drv object pointing path) silently ignore flag.

title: Oracle Database Connection — oracle_con
text: Connect Oracle database. Provide username password secret means.

title: Oracle Database Connection — oracle_con
text: user Oracle username. pass Oracle password. dbname Database name.
